nodes.text: Vote Yes on Prop 31-814D was a propaganda poster designed by an unknown artist to denounce the shortcomings caused by the Trade Federation and to support the decision of the Galactic Senate to create tax free trade areas. It was a yellow poster, with a red "no" sign across the Trade Federation Logo, with the words "Federation Profits = Galactic Poverty" as well as below that "Vote Yes on Prop 38-814D Tax Free Trade Zones."
